summary: Replaces the gold coin texture with a much improved one.
descriptionHtml:
Gold Coin Replacer by Ra)

Description
===========
Replaces the gold coin texture with a much improved one.

Install
=======
1. Extract the archive and copy \'Data\' to \'Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\'

Uninstall
=========

Go to Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\clutter
and delete coin01.dds and coin01_n.dds

History
=======

0.1, 11/23/2011 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
PM me here on the Nexus.

Tools Used
==========
CrazyBump - http://www.crazybump.com
Photoshop - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============

You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod.
author: Me
